basic.description:
Students can apply to undertake a practical internship in theatre production or administration.
NOTE    Students will be given a grade of Pass/Fail for work done.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Internship

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     Level 3 and (registration in a DRAM Major or Medial Plan) and (a GPA of 2.90 in DRAM) and permission of the Department.
